# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Pipe group for water at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Pipe group (fluid_system=152301, position=x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Electricity distribution at position(x=111.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Small electric pole (position x=111.5, y=-30.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=115.5, y=-30.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=112.5, y=-24.5)
-  Small electric pole (position x=120.5, y=-26.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to the furnace before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it

### Errors when using steam engine but being not connected
-  Make sure the steam engine is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it

### Errors when using pipe group but being empty
-  Ensure the pipe group has a fluid before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables that have been assigned:
  -  `wooden-chest`: 1
  -  `transport-belt`: 108
  -  `burner-inserter`: 3
  -  `small-electric-pole`: 6
  -  `stone-furnace`: 1
  -  `wood`: 2
  -  `copper-ore`: 20
  -  `iron-plate`: 625
  -  `copper-plate`: 1
  -  `iron-gear-wheel`: 52
